abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers defeat Toronto Maple Leafs, 3-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Zuccarello helped send the Rangers to a 3-1 home win over the Toronto Maple Leafs on Friday night.

headline.main: Mats Zuccarello Records Hat Trick as Rangers Down Maple Leafs
headline.print_headline: Zuccarello Records Hat Trick as Rangers Down Maple Leafs

snippet: Zuccarello helped send the Rangers to a 3-1 home win over the Toronto Maple Leafs on Friday night.
